title: Scanlation Community Survey 2022 - JPKRCN Report
description:
Presentation by: Nene and anon.

Analysis of differences within the manga, manhwa, and manhua scanlation communities and translator differences, using data collected from a 2022 online survey of past and current scanlators and building upon the summary report. Same methodology as the generations report.

PDF download: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1AUz0YqLlvJvf8qWZ8QdscVVZm6dVdvRn/view?usp=drive_link

Previously released summary report: https://cubari.moe/read/gist/cmF3L1BlaW50cmVzc2Uvc2NzdS9tYXN0ZXIvU2NhbmxhdGlvbiUyMENvbW11bml0eSUyMFN1cnZleSUyMDIwMjIlMjAtJTIwU3VtbWFyeSUyMFJlcG9ydC5qc29u/
